quote: Realistically, it's a risk, I suppose, but in this day and age, you almost have to choose between freedom, which can devolve into chaos, and security, which can become a pair of shackles.
quote_letters: REALISTICALLY ITS A RISK I SUPPOSE BUT IN THIS DAY AND AGE YOU ALMOST HAVE TO CHOOSE BETWEEN FREEDOM WHICH CAN DEVOLVE INTO CHAOS AND SECURITY WHICH CAN BECOME A PAIR OF SHACKLES
